snippet.description: Sep 11, 2013 ... Hunters in Mississippi have broken the state's record for the biggest alligator ever caught – and have done so three times in one week.

snippet.title: Giant Crocodile Breaks Size Record—Suspected in Fatal Attacks
snippet.description: Jul 2, 2012 ... A saltwater crocodile captured last year in the Philippines is the largest in captivity, the Guinness World Records announced recently.
